subject: Carbon fiber wheel hub not working.
description_text:
I purchased a simsonn Carbon fiber wheel hub off Amazon about 6 months ago.
It no longer works, when I plug it into the PC I get an error saying the
drivers failed to initialize. And that the device is not recognized. Is
there some trouble shooting I could go through to fix it.

conversations.body_text: Hi Ike O'Keefe,  Please provide your order number. Also, make sure the USB cable is plugged directly into a rear USB3.0 (blue) port on your computer, rather than through a USB hub. If the issue persists, it might be caused by a damaged USB spring cable. We can send you a replacement for free — please provide your contact name, phone number, and full shipping address.

My amazon order number is 111-9003958-2885004 The wheel is normally plugged
into a rear usb 3.0 port, I have tried the other ports on the PC as well.
If you decide a replacement cable is the right course of action my full
name and shipping address are
Ike O'Keefe
4660 Mcdonald Dr N
Stillwater MN
55082
Phone number: 651-343-3750

On Fri, Oct 17, 2025, 9:16 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Ike O'Keefe,  Here is the tracking number: SF6045977852140. You can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill
